name: Urgon The Demon Within
description:
This game was just a excuse to learn a few things and to be able to make my first ever game. It's called Urgon The Demon Within and this Ren'py visual novel is a short story about a demon called Urgon that tries to keep the player in his void to extract fear from the player. This fear is needed to sustain the existence of Hell.

Since this game was just a learning experience, I use a bunch of assets that are not mine. So I will just credit what I use in here:

- The street music is the "Play with me" song from Doki Doki.

- The void music is the main menu music from UCN.

- Urgon 's avatar was created on a website called "Picrew.me"

- And the sounds Urgon makes when he speaks was Midas from Fortnite slowed down (no joke!)

Also there are four endings! Try to get them all!
